23.ara-name: كتاب الجهاد عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik: "The Prophet (ﷺ) rode a horse belonging to Abu Talhah called Mandub. He said: 'There is nothing to be frightened of, and we found him to be (quick) like the sea.'" [Abu 'Eisa said:] There is something on this topic from Ibn 'Amr Al-'As

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْخُرُوجِ عِنْدَ الْفَزَعِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Going Out During The Time Of Fright
